description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Developing software applications for Japanese/ American clients
              
              - Implementing the application in compliance with the quality standards of the company.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              – 2 - 3 years of experience with PHP and MySQL
              
              – Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science
              
              – Japanese or English is big plus
              
              – Have experience with one of MVC framework such as Laravel, CakePhp,  CodeIgniter, Yii, Symfony (Experience in Laravel is as plus)
              
              – Have experience with one of CMS such as WordPress, Magento, Ec-cube, Joomla
              
              – Excellent database knowledge especially MySQL
              
              – Have experience and good at HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery is plus.
              
              – Have experience of any JavaScript front-end framework/ Library e.g. AngularJS, ReactJS,…
              
              – Good knowledge in web service – RESTful, JSON or websockets
              
              – Knowledge of object oriented PHP programming
              
              – Knowledge of Bootstrap, HTML5 and CSS3
              
              – Working knowledge in source version control (SVN, GIT)
              
              – Good in using Linux-based operating systems, usage and scripting of Linux-command line (Bash or similar)
              

              ***BENEFITS:
              

              ***Successful candidates will have the following benefits:
              
              - Competitive salary
              
              - The 13th month salary
              
              - Health check every year in prestigious hospital
              
              - Travel trip once/year- Special holidays of company
              
              - Public holiday and Annual leave are in accordance with the Vietnamese Labour
              
              - Excellent Social, Health Insurance
              
              - Working time is 8:30~17:30 Mon ~ Fri
              
              - Having chance to learn Japanese is free
              
              - Sponsored for Group party, team building activities, Sport activities
              
              - Opportunities to work with talented colleagues in Viet Nam and Japan.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
